fields.name: Riddle 1
fields.description: I am not alive, but I can grow. I don't have lungs, but I need air. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 2
fields.description: Turn me on my side and I am everything. Cut me in half and I am nothing. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 3
fields.description: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 4
fields.description: What comes once in a minute, twice in a moment, but never in a thousand years?

fields.name: Riddle 5
fields.description: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 6
fields.description: I can fly without wings. I can cry without eyes. Whenever I go, darkness flies. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 7
fields.description: I have keys but open no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter, but you can't go outside. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 8
fields.description: The person who makes it sells it. The person who buys it never uses it. The person who uses it never knows they're using it. What is it?

fields.name: Riddle 9
fields.description: What is always in front of you but can’t be seen?

fields.name: Riddle 10
fields.description: I am taken from a mine, and shut up in a wooden case, from which I am never released, and yet I am used by almost every person. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 1
fields.description: What can run but never walks, has a mouth but never talks, has a head but never weeps, and has a bed but never sleeps?

fields.name: Riddle 2
fields.description: What has eight to ten letters and travels around the world without moving?

fields.name: Riddle 3
fields.description: What belongs to you but others use it more than you do?

fields.name: Riddle 4
fields.description: I’m light as a feather, yet the strongest person can’t hold me for five minutes. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 5
fields.description: What can you catch, but not throw?

fields.name: Riddle 6
fields.description: What is so fragile that saying its name breaks it?

fields.name: Riddle 7
fields.description: I am a word of letters three, add two and fewer there will be. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 8
fields.description: What gets bigger the more you take away?

fields.name: Riddle 9
fields.description: I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 10
fields.description: I have cities but no houses, forests but no trees, and rivers but no water. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 1
fields.description: I’m tall when I’m young, and I’m short when I’m old. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 2
fields.description: What has hands but can’t clap?

fields.name: Riddle 3
fields.description: What has to be broken before you can use it?

fields.name: Riddle 4
fields.description: What is full of holes but still holds water?

fields.name: Riddle 5
fields.description: What question can you never answer 'yes' to?

fields.name: Riddle 6
fields.description: What is it that lives if it is fed, and dies if you give it a drink?

fields.name: Riddle 7
fields.description: What is seen in the middle of March and April but can’t be seen at the beginning or end of either month?

fields.name: Riddle 8
fields.description: What word is pronounced the same if you take away four of its five letters?

fields.name: Riddle 9
fields.description: What is as light as a feather, yet the strongest man cannot hold it for much longer than a minute?

fields.name: Riddle 10
fields.description: Forward I am heavy, but backward I am not. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 1
fields.description: What has words, but never speaks?

fields.name: Riddle 2
fields.description: I’m found in socks, scarves, and mittens; and often in the paws of playful kittens. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 3
fields.description: What is always coming but never arrives?

fields.name: Riddle 4
fields.description: I have branches, but no fruit, trunk, or leaves. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 5
fields.description: You can hold me in your hand but use me with your head. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 6
fields.description: What can fill a room but takes up no space?

fields.name: Riddle 7
fields.description: I go in hard, come out soft, and am never the same. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 8
fields.description: What is more useful when it is broken?

fields.name: Riddle 9
fields.description: What travels around the world but stays in one corner?

fields.name: Riddle 10
fields.description: I have a heart that never beats. I have a home but I never sleep. I can take a man's house and build another's. And I love to play games with my many brothers. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 1
fields.description: What has roots that nobody sees, is taller than trees, up, up it goes, and yet never grows?

fields.name: Riddle 2
fields.description: What can fill a house like air but sits in your pocket without weight?

fields.name: Riddle 3
fields.description: It’s been around for millions of years, but is never more than a month old. What is it?

fields.name: Riddle 4
fields.description: Alive without breath, as cold as death; never thirsty, ever drinking, all in mail never clinking. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 5
fields.description: I am found in every forest, yet none can hold me in their hands. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 6
fields.description: I speak in a language without words, and tales of past I hold. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 7
fields.description: I dance but have no feet. I follow you around, yet you cannot see me. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 8
fields.description: What can run but cannot walk, has a mouth but never talks, has a bed but never sleeps?

fields.name: Riddle 9
fields.description: In the forest of secrets, I am the path to light. Without me, the lost stay lost. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 10
fields.description: I weave the threads of life in a tapestry unseen, in the enchanted forest, I reign as queen. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 1
fields.description: What has a face and two hands but no arms or legs?

fields.name: Riddle 2
fields.description: What is made of water but if you put it into water it will die?

fields.name: Riddle 3
fields.description: When you need me, you throw me away. But when you’re done with me, you bring me back. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 4
fields.description: What has a neck but no head?

fields.name: Riddle 5
fields.description: What can run but never gets tired?

fields.name: Riddle 6
fields.description: What has four wheels and flies, but is not an airplane?

fields.name: Riddle 7
fields.description: What can go up a chimney down, but cannot go down a chimney up?

fields.name: Riddle 8
fields.description: I turn everything around but do not move. When what is up should be down, give me a whirl. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 9
fields.description: I exist only when you are here, once gone I too disappear. What am I?

fields.name: Riddle 10
fields.description: At the heart of this labyrinth, time stands still for all, and yet it governs every step you take. What am I?
